Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Check this one out, he says, "In God, We Trust"  how can anyone doubt  that 
these are spirits?  I've heard my own mother speaking, my great Aunt  Hazel 
Lilly with her husband Ralph say their own names, using their own  voices.  
Why don't you folks believe them?  They are not from outer  space, they are 
not radio fragments, nor are they monsters and demons, these are  people 
like us, that have left this physical world, to live in the world of  spirit.  
How can any of you doubt when they are all around us?  sf
